title: I'm seeing new touch problems on Pixel 4a 5G since the Feb update
content:
I read about touch problems others were having that were supposedly fixed by the Feb update. I had none of those problems. But since the Feb update I have been experiencing touch problems on my 4a 5G, but these seem different than others that have been mentioned.

Its a little hard to characterize. The problems seem to occur just after awakening the phone by finger touch. The first touch action on the screen then often is wrong. I click on an icon and instead of launching that app it does something else. Sometimes it brings up the apps screen. Other times it does *something* (uncertain what) and then repaints the home screen.

After that it seems to return to normal operation. This is not crippling, but it is annoying.

Has anyone else seen this? Is there a fix?
